mapper.select: SELECT s.ID , s.ARTICLE_ID , s.RESUME_ID , (SELECT c.NAME FROM COMPANY c WHERE c.ID = a.COMPANY_ID) AS company_name , a.TITLE AS ARTICLE_TITLE , r.TITLE AS RESUME_TITLE , s.CONSENT FROM SEND s LEFT OUTER JOIN ARTICLE a ON s.ARTICLE_ID = a.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN RESUME r ON s.RESUME_ID = r.ID WHERE s.RESUME_ID IN (SELECT r2.ID FROM RESUME r2 WHERE r2.MEMBER_ID = #{id})

SELECT s.ID , s.ARTICLE_ID , s.RESUME_ID , (SELECT m.NAME FROM "MEMBER" m WHERE m.ID = r.MEMBER_ID) AS member_name , a.TITLE AS ARTICLE_TITLE , r.TITLE AS RESUME_TITLE , s.CONSENT FROM SEND s LEFT OUTER JOIN ARTICLE a ON s.ARTICLE_ID = a.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN RESUME r ON s.RESUME_ID = r.ID WHERE s.ARTICLE_ID IN (SELECT a2.ID FROM ARTICLE a2 WHERE a2.COMPANY_ID = #{id})
mapper.update: UPDATE SEND SET CONSENT = SYSDATE WHERE id = #{id}
